title: Deep exploration & documentation of golem system
description: Thoroughly explore claude-golem to understand all its components, then create comprehensive documentation and visual map. Document how golem + zikaron form the complete system.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Explore ralph.zsh - document main function, subcommands, execution loop
Explore lib/*.zsh - document all modules (commands, models, registry, secrets, setup, ui, watcher, worktrees)
Explore bun/ - document TypeScript core (Ink UI, story management)
Explore contexts/ - document the context system and all available contexts
Explore skills/golem-powers/ - document all skills and their purposes
Create docs.local/ralph-ideas.md with improvement ideas discovered during exploration
Create contexts/golem-system.md explaining golem + zikaron as one system
Create docs/architecture.md with detailed explanation of how everything works
Create docs/architecture-map.md with ASCII/mermaid visual of the system
Add golem-system to recommended contexts for both golem and zikaron
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: docs: MP-127 golem system documentation and architecture
